name: MIDIControlTransform
desc: A structure that describes the transformation of MIDI control change events.

items.name: var controlType: MIDITransformControlType
items.desc: The type of control specified by the control number.

items.name: var transform: MIDITransformType
items.desc: The type of transformation to apply to the event values.

items.name: var param: Int16
items.desc: An argument to the transformation method.

items.name: init(controlType: MIDITransformControlType, remappedControlType: MIDITransformControlType, controlNumber: UInt16, transform: MIDITransformType, param: Int16)
